attributes.action: Bring the UK back into the Junior Eurovision Song Contest (JESC)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Junior Eurovision song contest was created in 2003, and the UK entered but then withdrew in 2006.
In the years that the UK had entered, their entries had come high up in the total points board. They withdrew due to lack of interest, if the UK were to promote it more, then then I am 99.9% sure that there would be a great deal of interest, it would be a great influence to today's youth as there are many anti social behaviour and lack of creativity- possibly causing problems in their future and certainly in today's society.
The UK pay a lot for the Eurovision- how about actually getting something out of it?

bring the UK back! (maybe we might actually get far in a Song Contest)

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
